title: Learn How to Dance Like a Pro with Diversity’s Perri Kiely

components.copy: Learn How to Dance Like a Pro with Diversity’s Perri Kiely

text: The nation’s newfound love for dance has reached new heights, with one in five mastering a social media dance trend. However, three quarters of young people still admit to feeling anxious about dancing in public.

To give people the confidence to hit the real-life dance floor, Perri Kiely reveals his top tips on how to brush up on the latest trending moves, and expertly capture them using the Samsung Galaxy A52 5G’s awesome camera capabilities.
